entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning this evening and ending before morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
